# <a name="build-your-first-powerpoint-add-in"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-101">生成首个 PowerPoint 加载项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-101">Build your first PowerPoint add-in</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="48db6-102">本文将逐步介绍如何使用 jQuery 和 Office JavaScript API 生成 PowerPoint 加载项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-102">In this article, you'll walk through the process of building a PowerPoint add-in by using jQuery and the Office JavaScript API.</span></span>

## <a name="create-the-add-in"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-103">创建加载项</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-103">Create the add-in</span></span> 

[!include[Choose your editor](../includes/quickstart-choose-editor.md)]

# <a name="visual-studiotabvisual-studio"></a>[<span data-ttu-id="48db6-104">Visual Studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-104">Visual Studio</span></span>](#tab/visual-studio)

### <a name="prerequisites"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-105">先决条件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-105">Prerequisites</span></span>

[!include[Quick Start prerequisites](../includes/quickstart-vs-prerequisites.md)]

### <a name="create-the-add-in-project"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-106">创建加载项项目</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-106">Create the add-in project</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-107">在 Visual Studio 菜单栏中，依次选择“文件”**** > “新建”**** > “项目”****。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-107">On the Visual Studio menu bar, choose  **File** > **New** > **Project**.</span></span>
    
2. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-108">在“Visual C#”**** 或“Visual Basic”**** 下的项目类型列表中，展开“Office/SharePoint”****，选择“加载项”****，再选择“PowerPoint Web 加载项”**** 作为项目类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-108">In the list of project types under **Visual C#** or **Visual Basic**, expand  **Office/SharePoint**, choose **Add-ins**, and then choose **PowerPoint Web Add-in** as the project type.</span></span> 

3. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-109">命名此项目，再选择“确定”****。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-109">Name the project, and then choose **OK**.</span></span>

4. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-110">在“创建 Office 加载项”**** 对话框窗口中，选择“将新功能添加到 PowerPoint”****，再选择“完成”**** 以创建项目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-110">In the **Create Office Add-in** dialog window, choose **Add new functionalities to PowerPoint**, and then choose **Finish** to create the project.</span></span>

5. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-p101">此时，Visual Studio 创建解决方案，且它的两个项目显示在“解决方案资源管理器”**** 中。**Home.html** 文件在 Visual Studio 中打开。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-p101">Visual Studio creates a solution and its two projects appear in **Solution Explorer**. The **Home.html** file opens in Visual Studio.</span></span>
    
### <a name="explore-the-visual-studio-solution"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-113">探索 Visual Studio 解决方案</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-113">Explore the Visual Studio solution</span></span>

[!include[Description of Visual Studio projects](../includes/quickstart-vs-solution.md)]

### <a name="update-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-114">更新代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-114">Update the code</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-115">**Home.html** 指定在加载项的任务窗格中呈现的 HTML。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-115">**Home.html** specifies the HTML that will be rendered in the add-in's task pane.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-116">在 **Home.html** 中，将 `<body>` 元素替换为以下标记，并保存文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-116">In **Home.html**, replace the `<body>` element with the following markup and save the file.</span></span>
 
    ```html
    <body class="ms-font-m ms-welcome">
        <div id="content-header">
            <div class="padding">
                <h1>Welcome</h1>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div id="content-main">
            <div class="padding">
                <p>Select a slide and then choose the buttons to below to add content to it.</p>
                <br />
                <h3>Try it out</h3>
                <button class="ms-Button" id="insert-image">Insert Image</button>
                <br/><br/>
                <button class="ms-Button" id="insert-text">Insert Text</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </body>
    ```

2. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-117">打开 Web 应用项目根目录中的文件“Home.js”****。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-117">Open the file **Home.js** in the root of the web application project.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-118">此文件指定加载项脚本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-118">This file specifies the script for the add-in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-119">将整个内容替换为以下代码，并保存文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-119">Replace the entire contents with the following code and save the file.</span></span>

    ```js
    'use strict';

    (function () {

        // The initialize function must be run each time a new page is loaded
        Office.initialize = function (reason) {
            $(document).ready(function () {
                $('#insert-image').click(insertImage);
                $('#insert-text').click(insertText);
            });
        };
    
        function insertImage() {
            Office.context.document.setSelectedDataAsync(getImageAsBase64String(), {
                coercionType: Office.CoercionType.Image,
                imageLeft: 50,
                imageTop: 50,
                imageWidth: 400
            },
                function (asyncResult) {
                    if (asyncResult.status === Office.AsyncResultStatus.Failed) {
                        console.log(asyncResult.error.message);
                    }
                });
        }  

        function insertText() {
            Office.context.document.setSelectedDataAsync("Hello World!",
                function (asyncResult) {
                    if (asyncResult.status === Office.AsyncResultStatus.Failed) {
                        console.log(asyncResult.error.message);
                    }
                });
        }

        function getImageAsBase64String() {
            return '';
        }

    })();
    ```

3. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-120">打开 Web 应用项目根目录中的文件“Home.css”****。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-120">Open the file **Home.css** in the root of the web application project.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-121">此文件指定加载项自定义样式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-121">This file specifies the custom styles for the add-in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-122">将整个内容替换为以下代码，并保存文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-122">Replace the entire contents with the following code and save the file.</span></span>

    ```css
    #content-header {
        background: #2a8dd4;
        color: #fff;
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 80px; 
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    #content-main {
        background: #fff;
        position: fixed;
        top: 80px;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        overflow: auto; 
    }

    .padding {
        padding: 15px;
    }
    ```

### <a name="update-the-manifest"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-123">更新清单</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-123">Update the manifest</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-124">打开加载项项目中的 XML 清单文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-124">Open the XML manifest file in the Add-in project.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-125">此文件定义的是加载项设置和功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-125">This file defines the add-in's settings and capabilities.</span></span>

2. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-126">元素具有占位符值。`ProviderName`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-126">The `ProviderName` element has a placeholder value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-127">将其替换为你的姓名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-127">Replace it with your name.</span></span>

3. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-128">元素的 `DefaultValue` 属性有占位符。`DisplayName`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-128">The `DefaultValue` attribute of the `DisplayName` element has a placeholder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-129">将它替换为“My Office Add-in”****。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-129">Replace it with **My Office Add-in**.</span></span>

4. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-130">元素的 `DefaultValue` 属性有占位符。`Description`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-130">The `DefaultValue` attribute of the `Description` element has a placeholder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-131">将它替换为“A task pane add-in for PowerPoint”****。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-131">Replace it with **A task pane add-in for PowerPoint**.</span></span>

5. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-132">保存文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-132">Save the file.</span></span>

    ```xml
    ...
    <ProviderName>John Doe</ProviderName>
    <DefaultLocale>en-US</DefaultLocale>
    <!-- The display name of your add-in. Used on the store and various places of the Office UI such as the add-ins dialog. -->
    <DisplayName DefaultValue="My Office Add-in" />
    <Description DefaultValue="A task pane add-in for PowerPoint"/>
    ...
    ```

### <a name="try-it-out"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-133">试用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-133">Try it out</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-p109">使用 Visual Studio 的同时，按 F5 或选择“开始”**** 按钮启动 PowerPoint，以测试新建的 PowerPoint 加载项，功能区中显示有“显示任务窗格”**** 加载项按钮。加载项本地托管在 IIS 上。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-p109">Using Visual Studio, test the newly created PowerPoint add-in by pressing F5 or choosing the **Start** button to launch PowerPoint with the **Show Taskpane** add-in button displayed in the ribbon. The add-in will be hosted locally on IIS.</span></span>

2. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-136">在 PowerPoint 中，插入新的空白幻灯片，再依次选择“主页”**** 选项卡和功能区中的“显示任务窗格”**** 按钮，以打开加载项任务窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-136">In PowerPoint, insert a new blank slide, choose the **Home** tab, and then choose the **Show Taskpane** button in the ribbon to open the add-in task pane.</span></span>

    ![突出显示了“显示任务窗格”按钮的 PowerPoint 屏幕截图](../images/powerpoint_quickstart_addin_1.png)

3. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-138">在任务窗格中，选择“插入图像”**** 按钮，以便将图像添加到选定幻灯片。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-138">In the task pane, choose the **Insert Image** button to add an image to the selected slide.</span></span>

    ![幻灯片上显示有狗图像的 PowerPoint 屏幕截图](../images/powerpoint_quickstart_addin_2.png)

4. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-140">在任务窗格中，选择“插入文本”**** 按钮，以便将文本添加到选定幻灯片。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-140">In the task pane, choose the **Insert Text** button to add text to the selected slide.</span></span>

    ![幻灯片上显示有狗图像和文本“Hello World”的 PowerPoint 屏幕截图](../images/powerpoint_quickstart_addin_3.png)

# <a name="any-editortabvisual-studio-code"></a>[<span data-ttu-id="48db6-142">任意编辑器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-142">Any editor</span></span>](#tab/visual-studio-code)

### <a name="prerequisites"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-143">先决条件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-143">Prerequisites</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="48db6-144">Node.js</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-144">Node.js</span></span>](https://nodejs.org)

- <span data-ttu-id="48db6-145">全局安装最新版 [Yeoman](https://github.com/yeoman/yo) 和 [Office 加载项的 Yeoman 生成器](https://github.com/OfficeDev/generator-office)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-145">Install the latest version of [Yeoman](https://github.com/yeoman/yo) and the [Yeoman generator for Office Add-ins](https://github.com/OfficeDev/generator-office) globally.</span></span>

    ```bash
    npm install -g yo generator-office
    ```

### <a name="create-the-add-in-project"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-146">创建加载项项目</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-146">Create the add-in project</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-147">在本地驱动器上创建文件夹，并将它命名为“`my-powerpoint-addin`”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-147">Create a folder on your local drive and name it `my-powerpoint-addin`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-148">将在其中创建外接程序文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-148">This is where you'll create the files for your add-in.</span></span>

2. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-149">转到新文件夹。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-149">Navigate to your new folder.</span></span>

    ```bash
    cd my-powerpoint-addin
    ```

3. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-150">使用 Yeoman 生成器创建 PowerPoint 加载项项目。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-150">Use the Yeoman generator to create a PowerPoint add-in project.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-151">运行下面的命令，再回答如下所示的提示问题：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-151">Run the following command and then answer the prompts as follows:</span></span>

    ```bash
    yo office
    ```

    - <span data-ttu-id="48db6-152">**选择一个项目类型：** `Jquery`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-152">**Choose a project type:** `Jquery`</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="48db6-153">**选择一个脚本类型：** `Javascript`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-153">**Choose a script type:** `Javascript`</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="48db6-154">**要将你的外接程序命名为什么?:** `My Office Add-in`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-154">**What do you want to name your add-in?:** `My Office Add-in`</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="48db6-155">**要支持哪一个 Office 客户端应用程序?:** `Powerpoint`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-155">**Which Office client application would you like to support?:** `Powerpoint`</span></span>

    ![有关 Yeoman 生成器提示和回答的屏幕截图](../images/yo-office-powerpoint-jquery.png)
    
    <span data-ttu-id="48db6-157">完成向导后，生成器将创建项目并安装提供支持的 Node 组件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-157">After you complete the wizard, the generator will create the project and install supporting Node components.</span></span>

### <a name="update-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-158">更新代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-158">Update the code</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-159">在代码编辑器中，打开项目根目录中的“index.html”****。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-159">In your code editor, open **index.html** in the root of the project.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-160">此文件包含在加载项任务窗格中呈现的 HTML。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-160">This file contains the HTML that will be rendered in the add-in's task pane.</span></span>

2. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-161">将 `<body>` 元素内的 `<header>` 元素替换为以下标记。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-161">Replace the `<header>` element inside the `<body>` element with the following markup.</span></span>

    ```html
    <div id="content-header">
        <div class="padding">
            <h1>Welcome</h1>
        </div>
    </div>
    ```

3. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-162">将 `<body>` 元素内的 `<main>` 元素替换为以下标记，并保存文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-162">Replace the `<main>` element inside the `<body>` element with the following markup and save the file.</span></span>

    ```html
    <div id="content-main">
        <div class="padding">
            <p>Select a slide and then choose the buttons below to add content to it.</p>
            <br />
            <h3>Try it out</h3>
            <button class="ms-Button" id="insert-image">Insert Image</button>
            <br/><br/>
            <button class="ms-Button" id="insert-text">Insert Text</button>
        </div>
    </div>
    ```

4. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-163">打开项目根目录中的文件“app.js”****，以指定加载项脚本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-163">Open the file **app.js** in the root of the project to specify the script for the add-in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-164">将整个内容替换为以下代码，并保存文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-164">Replace the entire contents with the following code and save the file.</span></span>

    ```js
    'use strict';

    (function () {

        // The initialize function must be run each time a new page is loaded
        Office.initialize = function (reason) {
            $(document).ready(function () {
                $('#insert-image').click(insertImage);
                $('#insert-text').click(insertText);
            });
        };
    
        function insertImage() {
            Office.context.document.setSelectedDataAsync(getImageAsBase64String(), {
                coercionType: Office.CoercionType.Image,
                imageLeft: 50,
                imageTop: 50,
                imageWidth: 400
            },
                function (asyncResult) {
                    if (asyncResult.status === Office.AsyncResultStatus.Failed) {
                        console.log(asyncResult.error.message);
                    }
                });
        }  

        function insertText() {
            Office.context.document.setSelectedDataAsync("Hello World!",
                function (asyncResult) {
                    if (asyncResult.status === Office.AsyncResultStatus.Failed) {
                        console.log(asyncResult.error.message);
                    }
                });
        }

        function getImageAsBase64String() {
            return '';
        }

    })();
    ```

5. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-165">打开项目根目录中的文件“app.css”****，以指定加载项自定义样式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-165">Open the file **app.css** in the root of the project to specify the custom styles for the add-in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-166">将整个内容替换为以下内容，并保存文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-166">Replace the entire contents with the following and save the file.</span></span>

    ```css
    #content-header {
        background: #2a8dd4;
        color: #fff;
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 80px; 
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    #content-main {
        background: #fff;
        position: fixed;
        top: 80px;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        overflow: auto; 
    }

    .padding {
        padding: 15px;
    }
    ```

### <a name="update-the-manifest"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-167">更新清单</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-167">Update the manifest</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-168">打开文件“my-office-add-in-manifest.xml”****，以定义加载项的设置和功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-168">Open the file **my-office-add-in-manifest.xml** to define the add-in's settings and capabilities.</span></span>

2. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-169">元素具有占位符值。`ProviderName`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-169">The `ProviderName` element has a placeholder value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-170">将其替换为你的姓名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-170">Replace it with your name.</span></span>

3. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-171">元素的 `DefaultValue` 属性有占位符。`Description`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-171">The `DefaultValue` attribute of the `Description` element has a placeholder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-172">将它替换为“A task pane add-in for PowerPoint”****。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-172">Replace it with **A task pane add-in for PowerPoint**.</span></span>

4. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-173">保存文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-173">Save the file.</span></span>

    ```xml
    ...
    <ProviderName>John Doe</ProviderName>
    <DefaultLocale>en-US</DefaultLocale>
    <!-- The display name of your add-in. Used on the store and various places of the Office UI such as the add-ins dialog. -->
    <DisplayName DefaultValue="My Office Add-in" />
    <Description DefaultValue="A task pane add-in for PowerPoint"/>
    ...
    ```

### <a name="start-the-dev-server"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-174">启动开发人员服务器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-174">Start the dev server</span></span>

[!include[Start server section](../includes/quickstart-yo-start-server.md)] 

### <a name="try-it-out"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-175">试用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-175">Try it out</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-176">请按照运行加载项所用平台对应的说明操作，以在 PowerPoint 中旁加载加载项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-176">Follow the instructions for the platform you'll use to run your add-in to sideload the add-in within PowerPoint.</span></span>

    - <span data-ttu-id="48db6-177">Windows：[在 Windows 上旁加载 Office 加载项](../testing/create-a-network-shared-folder-catalog-for-task-pane-and-content-add-ins.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-177">Windows: [Sideload Office Add-ins on Windows](../testing/create-a-network-shared-folder-catalog-for-task-pane-and-content-add-ins.md)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="48db6-178">PowerPoint Online：[在 Office Online 中旁加载 Office 加载项](../testing/sideload-office-add-ins-for-testing.md#sideload-an-office-add-in-on-office-online)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-178">PowerPoint Online: [Sideload Office Add-ins in Office Online](../testing/sideload-office-add-ins-for-testing.md#sideload-an-office-add-in-on-office-online)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="48db6-179">iPad 和 Mac：[在 iPad 和 Mac 上旁加载 Office 加载项](../testing/sideload-an-office-add-in-on-ipad-and-mac.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-179">iPad and Mac: [Sideload Office Add-ins on iPad and Mac](../testing/sideload-an-office-add-in-on-ipad-and-mac.md)</span></span>

2. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-180">在 PowerPoint 中，新建一个文件，再依次选择“主页”**** 选项卡和功能区中的“显示任务窗格”**** 按钮，以打开加载项任务窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-180">In PowerPoint, create a new file, choose the **Home** tab, and then choose the **Show Taskpane** button in the ribbon to open the add-in task pane.</span></span>

    ![突出显示了“显示任务窗格”按钮的 PowerPoint 屏幕截图](../images/powerpoint_quickstart_addin_1b.png)

3. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-182">在任务窗格中，选择“插入图像”**** 按钮，以便将图像添加到选定幻灯片。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-182">In the task pane, choose the **Insert Image** button to add an image to the selected slide.</span></span>

    ![幻灯片上显示有狗图像的 PowerPoint 屏幕截图](../images/powerpoint_quickstart_addin_2b.png)

4. <span data-ttu-id="48db6-184">在任务窗格中，选择“插入文本”**** 按钮，以便将文本添加到选定幻灯片。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-184">In the task pane, choose the **Insert Text** button to add text to the selected slide.</span></span>

    ![幻灯片上显示有狗图像和文本“Hello World”的 PowerPoint 屏幕截图](../images/powerpoint_quickstart_addin_3b.png)

---

## <a name="next-steps"></a><span data-ttu-id="48db6-186">后续步骤</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-186">Next steps</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="48db6-187">恭喜！已成功创建 PowerPoint 加载项！</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-187">Congratulations, you've successfully created a PowerPoint add-in!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="48db6-188">接下来，请详细了解 PowerPoint 加载项的功能，并跟着 PowerPoint 加载项教程一起操作，生成更复杂的加载项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48db6-188">Next, learn more about the capabilities of an Excel add-in and build a more complex add-in by following along with the Excel add-in tutorial.</span></span>
